value.desc: Function to call when scrolling occurs (identical to description of 'handler' prop of the Object form); If using the Object form, it is HIGHLY recommended to reference it from your vue component scope, otherwise the directive update cycle will continuously recreate the observer which hits performance hard
examples: v-intersection="{ handler: myFunction, cfg: { root: myScrollingParentEl, rootMargin: '10px 20px 30px 40px', threshold: [0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1] } }"

handler.desc: The handler function to be called

returns.desc: If you return Boolean false from the handler, the observer stops
returns.desc_cn: 如果从处理程序返回Boolean false，观察者将停止

boundingClientRect.desc: Object containing the client rect information

bottom.desc: The bottom of the client rect

height.desc: The height of the client rect

left.desc: The left of the client rect

right.desc: The right of the client rect

top.desc: The top of the client rect

width.desc: The width of the client rect

x.desc: The x position of the client rect

y.desc: The y position of the client rect

boundingClientRect.desc_cn: 包含客户端矩形信息的对象

intersectionRatio.desc: The ratio of the observed objects visibility
intersectionRatio.desc_cn: 观察对象的可见性比率

intersectionRect.desc: Object containing the client rect information

bottom.desc: The bottom of the client rect

height.desc: The height of the client rect

left.desc: The left of the client rect

right.desc: The right of the client rect

top.desc: The top of the client rect

width.desc: The width of the client rect

x.desc: The x position of the client rect

y.desc: The y position of the client rect

intersectionRect.desc_cn: 包含客户端矩形信息的对象

isIntersecting.desc: It is Boolean true if intersecting the scrollable area
isIntersecting.desc_cn: 如果与可滚动区域相交，则为Boolean true

rootBounds.desc: Object containing the client rect information

bottom.desc: The bottom of the client rect

height.desc: The height of the client rect

left.desc: The left of the client rect

right.desc: The right of the client rect

top.desc: The top of the client rect

width.desc: The width of the client rect

x.desc: The x position of the client rect

y.desc: The y position of the client rect

rootBounds.desc_cn: 包含客户端矩形信息的对象

handler.desc_cn: 要调用的处理程序函数

cfg.desc: Intersection observer options (can be omitted and all its props are optional)

root.desc: Lets you define an alternative to the viewport as your root (through its DOM element); It is important to keep in mind that root needs to be an ancestor of the observed element
root.desc_cn: 允许您定义可替代视区的元素作为根元素（通过其DOM元素）；必须记住，根元素必须是被观察元素的祖先

rootMargin.desc: Allows you to specify the margins for the root, effectively allowing you to either grow or shrink the area used for intersections
rootMargin.desc_cn: 允许您指定根元素的边距，有效地允许您扩大或缩小用于交叉的区域

threshold.desc: Threshold(s) at which to trigger callback, specified as a ratio, or list of ratios, of (visible area / total area) of the observed element
threshold.desc_cn: 触发回调的阈值，指定为观察元素的（可见面积/总面积）的比率或比率列表

cfg.desc_cn: 交叉观察者选项（可以省略，其所有属性都是可选的）

value.desc_cn: 发生滚动时要调用的函数（与对象形式的“handler”属性的描述相同）；如果使用对象形式，强烈建议从vue组件范围引用它，否则指令更新周期将持续重新创建观察者将严重影响性能

once.desc: Call handler only once, when the conditions are first met
once.desc_cn: 仅在第一次满足条件时调用处理程序一次
